name: Swifty 7 Trivia Game | Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.text:
EXAMPLE: "I like camping," said Tom ___.  The answer is INTENTLY. 

Note: The spellings are always correct American English, although the pronunciation may not be. The hint will tell the number of words and letters.  Also the beginning and last letters IE: S/LY or S/D.

QUESTION ONE:  "Don't forget to rate this quiz, you earn 20 FunTrivia credits," said Maskman22, ___.
questions.explanation:
Pointedly.

	If you rate quizzes, FunTrivia gives you twenty points for doing so.

questions.text: "How do you like your martini?" Tom asked ___.
questions.explanation:
Dryly&drily.

	Martinis are best dry, I've been told.

questions.text: "I've locked onto the target," Tom said ___.
questions.explanation:
Insightfully.

	If you're locked into a target, it's IN your SIGHTS.

questions.text: "Is your name Timothy or Russell?" Tom asked ___.
questions.explanation:
Timorously.

	Timothy or Russell...Tim or Russ.

questions.text: "That bald American icon is sick," Tom said ___.
questions.explanation:
Illegally.

	Bald American icon = Bald Eagle.  Sick + Eagle = Ill Eagle.

questions.text: "So this is where they make movies," Tom said ___.
questions.explanation:
Studiously.

	Movies are often made in a studio.

questions.text: "I'm as strong as a sled dog," Tom said ___.
"How come my clock only makes 'toc's?" Tom asked ___.
questions.explanation:
Mystically.

	If your clock only tocks, it's missing its tick.

questions.text: "My sign is Cancer, what's my horoscope?" Tom asked ___.
questions.explanation:
Crabbily.

	Cancer is the sign of the crab.

questions.text: "Who was Pope before John XXIII?" Tom asked ___.
questions.explanation:
Piously.

	Pope Pius XII (1939-58) Pope John XXIII (1958-63)
